Name: Moon Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
5 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Gin and sherry combine harmoniously in this stirred boozy cocktail with a  honeyed touch of jammy peach.
History: Created in 2008 by Thomas Waugh at Death & Co. , New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Moon Cocktail contains 188 calories
